com.epimorphics.jsonrdf
Class Context

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.jsonrdf.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReadContext, Cloneable
public class Context
extends Object
implements ReadContext, Cloneable

Encapsulates the mapping decisions to determine how RDF should be serialized in JSON to enable partial inversion. The source context information may be manually or automatically generated. The context itself should serializable in JSON to enable (partial) round tripping.

Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Dave Reynolds

clone

public Context clone()
Clone this context, so that JSON rendering using the clone does not affect this context. Each Prop object must also be cloned.

Overrides:

loadVocabularyAnnotations

public void loadVocabularyAnnotations(Set<String> seen,
                                      com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)

loadVocabularyAnnotations

public void loadVocabularyAnnotations(Set<String> notThese,
                                      com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m,
                                      com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.PrefixMapping prefixes)
Scan the given vocabulary file to find shortname and property type annotations. Ignore any URIs in notThese. Update notThese with any new URIs once we're done.

recordAltName

protected void recordAltName(String name,
                             String uri)
Record an alternative named to use to to shorted a URI. Will only be used when expanding queries, not for generation of shortform listings

                             com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.PrefixMapping pm)

getLocalName

protected String getLocalName(String uri)

recordPreferredName

public void recordPreferredName(String name,
                                String uri)
Record the preferred name to use to shorten a URI. If the name is already in use then only record as an alternate name

recordShortname

protected void recordShortname(String name,
                               String uri)
Record all preferred shortname => uri mappings that we find (even ones that the older code discards) so that we can detect clashes later.

completeContext

protected void completeContext()
URIs that have no preferred shortname are given their alternative shortname as their preferred shortname. This should be done once only to a Context.

checkShortnames

public void checkShortnames()
Check to see if there are any shortnames that map to multiple URIs. If so, throw a ResusedShortnameException that reports all such classes.

findProperty

public ContextPropertyInfo findProperty(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Property p)
Find the info record for a property. Create one if there's not one already there. Invent a shortname for the property if we have to create the record.

Specified by:
findProperty in interface ReadContext

findProperty

public ContextPropertyInfo findProperty(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Property p,
                                        String name)
Find the info record for a property. Create one if there's not one already there. If name is null, invent a shortname for this property, otherwise use name as the shortname.
